name: Trevenant & Dusknoir GX
author: Mitsuhiro Arita

attacks.name: Night Watch
attacks.effect: Choose 2 random cards from your opponent’s hand. Your opponent reveals those cards and shuffles them into their deck.

attacks.name: Pale Moon GX
attacks.effect: At the end of your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon will be Knocked Out. If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra {P} Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), discard all Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.
